title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description:
Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the File Type
The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Modify the file (move an existing class).
3) Click the 'SaveAs' icon next to the 'Save' icon. A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the file name, but ignore the extension which is not requested.
6) Click 'Ok'.

Observed Behavior:
The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
EB:
The file is now treated as a generic file since opening it displays the contents as plain text.

Expected Behavior:
The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Modify the file (move an existing class).
3) Click the 'SaveAs' icon next to the 'Save' icon. A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the file name and include the desired file extension.
6) Click 'Ok' to save the file with the specified extension.
